description.fr: Vaincre tous les Taures. \--- {%FightStarted} {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} aux Taures. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Ajoute le sort {Spell:136} à votre main.
description.en: Defeat all the Taurs. \--- {%FightStarted} {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} to Taurs. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Adds the {Spell:136} spell to your hand.
description.es: Vencer a todos los toros. \--- {%FightStarted} {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} a los toros. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Añade el hechizo {Spell:136} a tu mano.
description.de: Alle Tauren besiegen. \--- {%FightStarted} {ATvalue:pow,percent,+} für die Tauren. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Fügt deiner Hand den Zauber {Spell:136} hinzu.
description.pt: Derrotar todos os Tauros. \--- {%FightStarted}{ATvalue:pow,percent,+} aos Tauros. \--- {%FightTurnStartedPlayers} Adiciona o feitiço {Spell:136} à sua mão.
